alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 05 at 10:21AM EST until March 06 at 2:30AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise. .The Green River at Paradise crested this morning, and is beginning its fall. It is forecast to go below flood stage tonight. For the Green River...including Paradise...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING CONTINUES THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Paradise. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CST Saturday the stage was 380.4 feet. - Forecast...The river has crested, and is now falling. It is expected to fall below flood stage tonight. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
